details.input_file: The script expects an input file as an argument. This file will be used as the source for gene p-values or other data required by Depict2.

output_files.auc.txt: Output file for core gene AUC.
output_files.coreGene_hpoAUC: Output file for core gene HPO AUC.
output_files.genePvalue_hpoAUC: Output file for gene p-value HPO AUC.
output_files.genePvalues: Output file for converted gene p-values in text format.

execution_environment.SLURM: The script uses SLURM for job submission and resource allocation.
execution_environment.module system: The script uses a module system to load Java.
